analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol#600-614):

	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol#613-614)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol#754-786) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol#775-786)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/42/0xbcc1aa3bfc13c45df272ef2b99ca87248b0da952.sol#769-786)
